text.text_translated:
The Hunger Games is a special event that happens every year. The Capitol uses it to remind the districts, which are different areas of the country, that they are being punished for fighting against them.

Every year, one boy and one girl between 12 and 18 years old are chosen from each district. They are chosen by lottery, which means their names are picked by chance.

These chosen teenagers are called 'tributes'. Tributes are the people who must compete in a battle, or a fight, where only one person can survive, or stay alive.

All the people in the whole nation, which is the entire country, are forced to watch this event on television.
